languages.text: "Опытные Мастера орудий на дороге не валяются. Потому — пусть служит. Наказание — на твое усмотрение, Абеляр".

traits.locale_text: "Опытные Мастера орудий на дороге не валяются. Потому — пусть служит. Наказание — на твое усмотрение, Абеляр".

languages.text: "Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."
languages.original_text: "Опытные Мастера орудий на дороге не валяются. Потому — пусть служит. Наказание — на твое усмотрение, Абеляр".

traits.locale_text: "Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."
"Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."
"Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."
"Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."

languages.text: “经验丰富的军械大师实在是太少了。因此，出于这个原因，他可以继续担任这个职务。至于该如何惩罚他，就由你决定吧，阿贝拉德。”
languages.original_text: "Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: “经验丰富的军械大师实在是太少了。因此，出于这个原因，他可以继续担任这个职务。至于该如何惩罚他，就由你决定吧，阿贝拉德。”

languages.text: 「熟練のマスター・オヴ・オードナンスは、ほとんどいない。だからこそ、彼はその職責にとどまるべきだろう。処罰はお前の裁量に委ねる、アベラード」
languages.original_text: "Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: 「熟練のマスター・オヴ・オードナンスは、ほとんどいない。だからこそ、彼はその職責にとどまるべきだろう。処罰はお前の裁量に委ねる、アベラード」

languages.text: "Erfahrene Artillerieoffiziere sind selten. Aus diesem Grund – bleibt er auf seinem Posten. Die Bestrafung überlasse ich Euch, Abelard."
languages.original_text: "Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: "Erfahrene Artillerieoffiziere sind selten. Aus diesem Grund – bleibt er auf seinem Posten. Die Bestrafung überlasse ich Euch, Abelard."

languages.text: « Les maîtres de l'artillerie expérimentés sont rares. Pour cette raison, il restera en poste. Je vous laisse le soin de décider de son châtiment, Abélard. »
languages.original_text: "Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: « Les maîtres de l'artillerie expérimentés sont rares. Pour cette raison, il restera en poste. Je vous laisse le soin de décider de son châtiment, Abélard. »

languages.text: «Los Señores de la Artillería veteranos son un bien muy preciado. Ese es el único motivo por el que conservará su puesto. Dejo su castigo a su discreción, Abelard».
languages.original_text: "Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: «Los Señores de la Artillería veteranos son un bien muy preciado. Ese es el único motivo por el que conservará su puesto. Dejo su castigo a su discreción, Abelard».

languages.text: "Tecrübeli bir Mühimmat Üstadı'na az rastlanır. Bu nedenle makamında kalabilir. Cezasını ise senin takdirine bırakıyorum Abelard."
languages.original_text: "Experienced Masters of Ordnance are few and far between. So for that reason — he may remain in post. I leave his punishment at your discretion, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: "Tecrübeli bir Mühimmat Üstadı'na az rastlanır. Bu nedenle makamında kalabilir. Cezasını ise senin takdirine bırakıyorum Abelard."
